content:
ButtonBorderStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies the border style for a button control.

In this Article

public enum ButtonBorderStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ButtonBorderStyle

Remarks

This enumeration is used by DrawBorder.

DrawBorder updates the display of the button when controls are initially drawn or refreshed.

Fields

Dashed

A dashed border.
Dotted

A dotted-line border.
Inset

A sunken border.
None

No border.
Outset

A raised border.
Solid

A solid border.
